Causal Inference Tuo Wang 2020-10-18 Introduction This is the notes of Causal Inference. Most of the materials come from STAT 992 in UW-Madison instructed by Prof. Kang and from several textbooks in causal inference. Recommended textbook: Paul Rosenbaum. “Design of OBservational Studies” (2010) Miguel Hernan & James Robins. “Causal Inference” (2019) Guido Imbens and Don Rubin. “Causal Inference for Statistics, Social, and Biomedical Sciences” (2015)
